title: Abyss: The Plastic Abyss / Stranger in the House
description: Collects two novellas: "The Plastic Abyss" (1971) which was nominated for the 1971 Nebula Award for Best Novella, & "Stranger in the House" (1968). Enter Kate Wilhelm's realm of extrasensory perception, alternate universes, alien monsters, & something else, something much more strangeâ€”the abyss that lurks near each of us, ready to destroy us, or set us free.
author: Kate Wilhelm
